alert.note: Alert for Grande Ronde Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 15 at 1:53PM PDT until October 16 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 9 AM PDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 expected. * WHERE...Grande Ronde Valley. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 9 AM PDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
